title: The PUBG Fortnite War Rages On - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.28.18
description:
Thanks to Omaha Steaks for sponsoring this episode. Visit http://omahasteaks.com and enter KFGAMES in the search bar to get the Father's Day package.

Thanks to Brooklinen for sponsoring this episode. Get $20 off and free shipping with promo code GAMES at http://brooklinen.com

Andrea and Greg talk about PUBG learning from Fortnite's success.

Time Stamps -
00:03:30 - Housekeeping
The Roper Report   -
00:05:45 - PUBG Gonna Do Better, Eddie at GameSpot
00:10:15 - Fortnite sold 5 Million Battle Passes in a Day, Rebekah Valentine at GIB
00:13:30 - ESA Prez Mike Gallagher on LootBoxes, Matthew Handrahan at GIB
00:20:00 - The official list of upcoming games
 Reader mail   -
00:25:15 - Farmer - “What are your opinions on motion controls in games?”
00:: - VeggieRocky - 
00:35:00 - Michael Gulliver - “With judges week having just happened and you guys attending, has being in the press before E3 taken away some of the magic?“
00:38:48 - Drummerduck09 - “What’s the realistic chance for a Fallout 4 port on Switch?”
00:43:40 - Some guy - “How can Quantic Dream fix their reputation?”
00:45:48 - Squad Up: Devin - Devin2787 - XBOX One - “I need friends to play State of Decay 2 and PUBG with. Hit me up.”
00:46:20 - Dougzer - “DONT USE 3RD PARTY SWITCH DOCKS!”
00:47:10 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s host: Tim

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/
